name: Quora Ad-free
description:
This is a Quora ad-free stylish theme for those of you who are tired & confused of Quora Answers page that is flooded by ads.
And If sometimes you can't detect ads from answers this is your choice.
+ it's much cleaner and a little bit blue-ish
